title_paragraph_UserForgotPassword: Let's Unlock Your Password Quickly and Easily.
forgot_password_verification_code_detail: An Email With A Verification Code Has Been Sent To Your Registered Email Address.
forgot_password_validated_code_detail_me: The Provided Verification Code Has Been Successfully Validated. You Can Proceed With Safely Resetting Your Password.
update_forgot_password_detail_message_se: Your Password Has Been Successfully Updated. You Can Now Log In With Your New Password.
